title: Araiguma Rascal (Raccoon Rascal)
synopsis: Life in Brailsford Junction, Wisconsin, is simple and quiet for Sterling North, who spends most of his free time caring for animals. With his mother in the hospital and his brother fighting on the Western Front, the boy lives only with his father and his dog Hauser.
related_anime: ['Peter Pan no Bouken', 'Poka Poka Mori no Rascal', 'Araiguma Rascal Specials', 'Shiawase Pasta Story', 'Meitantei Rascal']
voices: ['Nozawa, Masako', 'Nozawa, Masako', 'Shikamata, Yuuji', 'Sugiyama, Kazuko', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Ishimori, Takkou']
staff: [['Bessho, Takaharu', ['Producer']], ['Koshi, Shigeo', ['Director']], ['Saitou, Hiroshi', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Endou, Masaharu', ['Director', ' Character Design']]]
